item.title: Fall 2025 Student Course Evaluations Now Open
item.description: Date: Tuesday, November 25, 2025 (all day) - Fall 2025 course evaluations are now open. The evaluation period will be open from November 25th through December 11th. Your feedback is very important to the Institute, the five schools, and their departments, so please complete evaluation surveys for all your courses! Evaluations will be available through Thursday, December 11th, 2025.

item.description: The Naval Nuclear Laboratory is the U.S. Navy’s trusted partner for superior propulsion technology, design, testing, training, and support. item.title: Now Accepting Spring Applications for RPI’s Collegiate Science & Technology Entry Program!
item.description: The Collegiate Science & Technology Entry Program (CSTEP) is excited to announce that applications for the Spring semester are now open! CSTEP is an academic enrichment program designed to support New York State residents who are economically disadvantaged and pursuing careers in STEM or health-related fields. Apply today by visiting the CSTEP website

item.title: Graduate Student Lunch and Learn- Personal financial management | Dec. 10 (Registration Required)
item.description: Date: Wednesday, December 10, 2025 10:30 AM - 12:30 PM - Professor Brian Clark presents insight into personal financial management. The core areas of managing personal finance consist of income, spending, investments, and protection. Learn how to develop strategies for managing budgeting, emergency funds, debt, and more. HYBRID Event. Seating is limited, and registration is required. Email sanchn2@rpi.edu.

item.description: Take a break from classes and join students from across campus for an afternoon of Mario Kart, snacks, and hot chocolate in PITTS 4204 (Sa Lounge). item.title: New at RPI Libraries: Tech & Textile Research Tools
item.description: RPI Libraries is pleased to announce access to two newly added research tools: O’Reilly for Higher Education – A robust collection of e-books, videos, audiobooks, and curated expert playlists spanning technology and business fields, including programming, cybersecurity, project management, communications, and presentation skills. Textile Technology Complete – A full-text database covering the scientific and technological dimensions of textile production and processing.

item.title: Payroll Office Moving to the Troy Building
item.description: The Payroll Team is moving from downtown Troy to Campus! Starting Monday, December 8th, the Payroll Team will be located on the 5th floor of the Troy building! As always, please feel free to submit a ticket to the Finance Support Site with any questions, but if you need to visit payroll in person for a scheduled appointment or to pick up a check, come see us in our new location in the Troy Building!
item.author: Community

item.title: RPI’s Inaugural Festival of Lessons and Carols on Dec 11
item.description: The RPI Concert Choir, with RPI’s Office of Religious and Spiritual Life, will present its inaugural Festival of Lessons and Carols. Following the format of the University of Cambridge’s famous festival, RPI’s program will interweave readings and music that celebrate charity and benevolence. The program will feature the RPI Concert Choir performing music of Durufle, Chesnokov, Rachmaninoff, Brahms and U2 alongside readings by several distinguished surprise guest readers! Admission is free.

item.title: Faculty Spotlight on Research & Impact webinar series-Helen Zha | Dec. 10
item.description: Date: Wednesday, December 10, 2025 2:00 PM - 2:30 PM - Materials That Renew Can Nature Help Us Meet Our Sustainability Goals? Nature provides many examples of materials that are exquisitely elegant in form and function. These materials can have high performance, be renewably made, and leave no lasting waste in our environment. Prof. Zha will discuss a future where biological systems are harnessed to inspire, make, and dispose of the materials we use in our daily lives.

item.title: Division of Human Resources Professional Development Workshop: “Getting the Most Out of AI with Percipio”
item.description: “Getting the Most Out of AI with Percipio” This workshop introduces you to Percipio’s AI Chat, AI Skill Benchmarks, and interactive AI scenarios. You’ll learn how to navigate AI Chat to explore ideas, ask questions, and get quick support. You’ll also be shown how to access and complete AI Skill Benchmarks and use guided scenarios to practice applying Percipio’s AI features.
